thread.section_title: eSURRANTY.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eSURRANTY.com | esurranty.com
thread.title: Julia Angel

author: Julia Angel
title: Julia Angel
text:
I am so glad I found you, guys! I canceled my phone coverage from my provider and was shopping for independent insurance companies that offered a comprehensive coverage and didn't charge arm and leg for it.
So I found eSuranty.com!
The enrollment process was super easy and fast. I paid for a year, up front, a lot less than the monthly payments would have cost me. There is even lesser amount to pay if you choose 2 years option.
Though I hope I will never need their services, I'll be back to renew my policy.
Highly recommend for an independent cellphone and tablet insurance.
